body.p:
Falsmouth Ky July 11t 1865
Govr Bramlette
Dear Sir:

I have this day enclosed to you the petition and recommendation of Thomas Earles & Wm. Haley for the remission of a fine. The signers to the recommendation are among the best citizens of our County, who know all about the circumstances of the case. I know myself all about it, and I prosecuted ^A^ Earles before the Examining Court, and am well aware of the whole progress of the case. I think it a more meritorious case than one in a hundred of the kind which are presented for executive clemency.
The Commonwealths Attorney, R. B. Carpenter assured them that he would attend to the matter, but has done nothing. I enclose the $2.00 fee

Pendleton Cir Ct
vs
Haly & Earles
sent for amt of bond
$500,
